text: Thank you <@U01QVR44MEY> for your reply. Please have a look at the code, they ID in person module is foreign ID in this dynamic table which is person_id variable.

```{% set filter_options = hubdb_table_rows("vacature_filters", "filter_type=" ~ query) %}```
Is probably what you want
Why when i get a richtext property from a contact the html tags is deleted?`{% set contact = crm_object("contact", "cedula="+request.query_dict.id, 'resumen_riesgo_f_i') %}`
